attributes.action: Force The Goverment To Subsidise Sanitary Products
attributes.additional_details:
The average cost of menstruating in the UK is £500 per year. 
135k girls miss school due to financial circumstances beyond their control. 
The government promised money into domestic abuse charities & projects for young people. 
None of their initiatives relieve the cost of sanitary items. 

Women do not choose to menstruate.  
Yet they are financially punished month in, month out.
attributes.background: We call on the government to subsidise the cost of sanitary items to all of those who are eligible for free NHS prescriptions, as a bare minimum.
